original_title: Salesman Pete and the Amazing Stone from Outer Space!
overview: Pete is a nice and clumsy salesman. But he's also a deadly super secret agent with a microprocessor implanted into his brain by some mad scientists from the government. He has to secretly stop a bunch of badguys who stole a magic stone that can change anything into seafood.
title: Salesman Pete and the Amazing Stone from Outer Space!
